markdownRemark.html:
I LOVE to learn. Working in software requires one to be continuously learning. I plan to write about things I've learned that I find interesting related to creating and delivering software. Topics won't be limited to software development, but that will be the main focus.

To start things off, here's a list of some of my favorite places I've been learning:

  • Conference talks: Awesome Talks, NDC Conferences, ReactRally, UtahJS, GOTO Play
  • YouTube channels: Success in Tech, Kevin Powell, Traversy Media
  • Meetups: Utah SC, SLC .NET, Utah React
  • Local conferences: UtahJS, React Rally, Big Mountain Data and Dev
  • Books: Accelerate, White Fragility, How To Be An Antiracist, Quiet, Domain Modeling Made Functional, The Imposter's Handbook, The Subtle Art Of Not Giving A !@#$
  • Online courses: CSS, React
  • Reddit: CSharp, Dotnet, ExperiencedDevs, JavaScript, Node, Programming, ReactJS, Webdev
  • Podcasts: BookBytes, Soft Skills Engineering

I'd love for you to tell me about your favorite places to learn.
